r.s: An implementation of the SMTP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the SMTP protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket class.
r.n: - Adding a new command() method for sending arbitrary SMTP commands. - More kinds of socket write() failures are now detected. - Improved PEAR_Error internal handling. (Bug 18469) - External authentication methods are now supported via setAuthMethod(). - Resource-based data streams are no longer terminated prematurely. (Bug 18563)
